definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: How can people know the contact information of each survey?
sentences.chinese: 巿民大众如何得知每次民意调查的样本资料？

sentences.english: It thus seems that people are rather positive about this year's address.
sentences.chinese: 由此看来，巿民似乎对施政报告有不错的评价。

sentences.english: He will then discuss the value of the Hong Kong market to these Chinese listed firms.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他将探讨香港巿场对内地上巿公司的价值。

sentences.english: He will then discuss the value of the Hong Kong market to these Chinese listed firms.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他将探讨香港巿场对内地上巿公司的价值。

sentences.english: It was larger and had a number of Roman soldiers living in it too.
sentences.chinese: 迦百农是一个较大的城巿，不少罗马士兵驻扎其中。

sentences.english: The manufacturer's scale is some influences with the strategy of the choice and competition of targe.
sentences.chinese: 厂商的规模影响目标巿场的选择与竞争的策略。

sentences.english: The town is much nicer than we remembered it.
sentences.chinese: 该巿远较我们记忆优美。

sentences.english: The second chapter elaborates our country urban planning faces the question.
sentences.chinese: 第二章论述我国城巿规划存在的问题。

sentences.english: The pressures of city life make him a mercenary person.
sentences.chinese: 都巿的生活压力使他变成一个巿侩的人。

sentences.english: The pressures of city life make him a mercenary person.
sentences.chinese: 都巿的生活压力使他变成一个巿侩的人。

sentences.english: Their new computer should be on the market sometime in the middle of the year.
sentences.chinese: 他们的新型计算机应在年中就可上巿。

sentences.english: ' Do you think what he said could help alleviate people's dissatisfaction?
sentences.chinese: 你认为特首呢番说话可唔可以平复巿民既不满情绪？

sentences.english: The questions include Hong Kong people's recognition and extent of support towards cross-strait political leaders.
sentences.chinese: 题目包括香港巿民对两岸领导人的认知和支持度。

sentences.english: Red Bean Paste is available from Japanese supermarkets or pastry supplies.
sentences.chinese: 心得红豆蓉于日式超级巿场或蛋糕材料专门店有售。

definition: Cheung Sha Wan (poultry market in Hong Kong)
to attend (an official function)/to be present/to administer/to approach (esp. as administrator)
variant of 蒞|莅[li4], to attend
sum of money raised (in a share subscription)
